subject: pro x upgrade
description_text: i currently am waiting for my plus x pedals to come in i was wondering if the pro x upgrade can be installed on them if i want to?

conversations.body_text: Hi Dylan Weaver,    Some of our clients have indeed succeeded in doing so, but it may be quite complex, so we do not recommend it.

Ok I got the pedal in yesterday they worked fine in iracing right away but now today the throttle isn’t being picked up on iracing I have the ground wire attached as well 

>

Hi Dylan Weaver,  Please set the Offset feature first to adjust the white signal to the 0% initial position. After that, recalibrate the pedals. Once done, the blue game progress bar will correctly reach 100% when you press the pedal.      Please note: iRacing requires an additional in-game calibration — all axes must be calibrated to an output value of 4095.
